word:
Eve, Mother of All
Genesis 1 and 2
     "By the word of the Lord were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of His mouth."  "For he spake, and it was done; he commanded, and it stood fast." Psalm 33:6, 9. He "laid the foundations of the earth, that it should not be removed for ever." Psalm 104:5.As the earth came forth from the hand of its Maker, it was exceedingly beautiful. . . . The angelic host viewed the scene with delight, and rejoiced at the wonderful works of God.
